title: Queensland Adults-Only Atherton Tablelands Farm Stay with Train Carriage Cabins & Glamping Tents
description:
Escape to Queensland's tranquil Atherton Tablelands with a farm stay like no other. This serene haven, set deep in the rolling hills, boasts redesigned train carriage cabins and cosy glamping tents within idyllic private farmland. Unwind in a truly unique setting, revelling in nature, the surrounding rainforest, friendly farm animals and vibrant wildlife.

A family run business prioritising space to disconnect, the property boasts lovable barn animals and access to the region's renowned waterfalls and crystal caves. Within Wooroonooran National Park, you're also primed to explore the dense tropical rainforest, diverse wildlife and elevated views of the lush Tablelands.
